result.title: Report on the DIGNITY process in the pilots: Four local strategies for an inclusive digital travel eco-system

result.title: Integrated Linked Data Modelling and Sharing framework
result.description: Based on the results of task T36 and the related high level linked data framework specification in task T31 and the preceding model developments in tasks T32T35 produce A report on the overall concept of an ontologybased integrated linked data modelling and sharing framework A set of application programming interface API specifications for querying the interlinked building data utilizing the renovationconstructionrelevant ontologies and models Generic adapters to external systems and data resources to support the connectivity and interoperability of the overall framework
